version_description:
Improved loading system main menu;
Bug that prevent the game open were fixed.

Hotfix for blue screen at opening the game;

Like our Facebook page, and follow the news.

Some bugs in the multiplayer have been fixed.
Now it's possible to set up house and bases in the multiplayer.
Claymore now spawns the map.
Attachments for weapons have been added.
Improvement in Artificial Intelligence of Zombies:
Fixed che

Fixed dupe items in multiplayer;
Fixed bug with chest;
Fixed bug that prevented sound from shooting in multiplayer;
Fixed bug with infection system.
Fixed bug in which car spawn with smoke;
Added Katana;
Zombies now have possibility to d

Fixed some bugs with zombies in multiplayer;
Fixed duplication of items with the chest and backpack full;
Fixed ad that was in front of the hot bar;
Fixed Katana spawn in multiplayer;
Added Voice Chat (test) in multiplayer;
Added 2 more lan

In this update we implemented a new artificial intelligence system for the zombies. In this system we focus on the optimization and performance of the game, including on multiplayer mode.

* Fixed a bug that caused the loading screen to blink while

Added a new deathmatch map with 15 player capacity;
Some bugs have been fixed;
Added time of 3 seconds before respawn;
Fixed bug with stairs;
Fixed an issue that made ads appear during the game;
Added two new server regions: Russia & Ru

* Fixed bug that prevented playing the multiplayer mode.
* Added an option to adjust camera sensitivity in "Options".

We are restructuring all ads in the game to get back to developing WithstandZ!
We will be updating all game systems, rebuild

In this update we implemented a new artificial intelligence system for the zombies. In this system we focus on the optimization and performance of the game, including on multiplayer mode.

* Fixed a bug that caused the loading screen to blink while

* Fixed problem that ad was over the items bar.
* Fixed problem with zombies spawn.
+ Added a new "Craft Coins" tab in the inventory, where it might be possible to create items using coins that could soon be earned by killing zombies or watching an

* Fixed zombies that did not die in multiplayer mode;
* Fixed zombie physics (we'll make more changes);
* The item drop of zombies has been improved;
* The synchronization of players' movement in multiplayer mode has been improved;
* In this u

Added option to protect servers by password.
Fixed issue with connection stability.
CraftCoin's system has been improved.

* Fixed some performance issues.
* Fixed weapon force on enemies (now they will be pushed backwards).
* FIXED: Destroying buildings generates a dead player.
* Axe now does less damage to zombies and more damage to trees.
+ Added new character
